data.title: Wavo.me on LinkedIn: Music Clickability: Drive Virality through TikTok Ads
data.meta_description:
Music marketers - looking to drive UGC virality through TikTok ads? 

In her new Wavo Blog post Arnavi Mehta writes that "with TikTok’s Music Clickability…
data.text:
LinkedIn and 3rd parties use essential and non-essential cookies to provide, secure, analyze and improve our Services, and to show you relevant ads (including professional and job ads) on and off LinkedIn. Learn more in our Cookie Policy.

Select Accept to consent or Reject to decline non-essential cookies for this use. You can update your choices at any time in your settings.

Music marketers - looking to drive UGC virality through TikTok ads? In her new Wavo Blog post Arnavi Mehta writes that "with TikTok’s Music Clickability feature fans can identify music while in an ad, click-through to browse content that has also used the same song and be prompted to use that music in their own UGC." https://lnkd.in/eZZqfSec
